message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me to consider. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we try $10,500?
